name: Junk Food Dodger | BlackThornProds Game Jam
name_original: Junk Food Dodger | BlackThornProds Game Jam
description:
Welcome to Junk Food Dodger! 

a game about avoiding unhealthy foods or junk food! These type of foods are some foods people like to eat. Like Pizza, Hot dogs, McDonald and other fast foods. Foods like these eating less of them is more.

-it is more healthy to mainly eat other foods like fruit, vegetiables, nuts, milk products like cheese, whole grain bread and others. 

-you can still have foods like a big mac but you shouldn't be eating it all of the time. 

Credits

Wideo.co - text-to-speech audio for intro

Tiny Worlds - Free Pixel Font - Thaleah

Crome Music Lap - simple way of making music

Piskel - Free software for making pixel art

Unity - used to make game
